text: János Jankó. János Jankó (1833-1896) was a Hungarian painter, caricaturist and graphicist. He is furthermore notable as one of the earliest Hungarian comics artists.https://www.lambiek.net/artists/j/janko_janos.htm ==Life== Jankó was born in Tótkomlós. He started to teach graphics while he was still at high school. Later he studied in Vienna, where he became known for his caricatures.https://www.lambiek.net/artists/j/janko_janos.htm His drawings were published in several Hungarian humor magazines, and they were popular and typical of the era. https://www.lambiek.net/artists/j/janko_janos.htm ==References== Category:Hungarian illustrators Category:Hungarian comics artists Category:Hungarian caricaturists Category:1833 births Category:1896 deaths Category:People from Tótkomlós Category:19th-century Hungarian painters
title: János Jankó
